description: Plugin for integrating data with Athena Health

ClientId.title: Client ID
ClientId.description: Client ID to use for authentication.

ClientSecret.title: Client Secret
ClientSecret.description: Client Secret to use for authentication.

PracticeId.title: Practice ID
PracticeId.description: Practice ID for the requested practice.

Departments.title: Departments
Departments.description: Comma separated list of department ID's to pull. If left blank, will pull all found within the practice

AppointmentTypes.title: Appointment Types
AppointmentTypes.description: Comma separated list of appointment ID's to pull. If left blank, will pull all found within the practice

StartDate.title: Start Date
StartDate.description: Historical appointments pull starting from this date

EndDate.title: End Date
EndDate.description: Historical appointments stop pulling after this date. If left blank, will continually be updated to run to the current day's date
